Miles Sound System SDK 6.6h

AIL_set_digital_master_room_type

The function AIL_set_digital_master_room_type sets the global room type to use.

void AIL_set_digital_master_room_type(
  HDIGDRIVER dig,
  S32 room_type
);

In Parameters

dig
indicates the driver for which the new master reverb settings are to be specified.
room_type
indicates the one of the MILES_ROOM_TYPE constants.

Discussion

This function calls AIL_set_digital_master_reverb and AIL_set_digital_master_reverb_levels to set EAX compatible room styles.

You need to set a non-zero wet reverb level of any samples that you want to apply global reverb to - use the AIL_set_sample_reverb_levels to do this.

Global reverb is very inexpensive to apply (about 0.25% - one forth of one percent - per sample).


Group: 2D Digital Audio Services
Related Functions: AIL_digital_master_reverb, AIL_digital_master_reverb_levels, AIL_set_digital_master_reverb, AIL_set_digital_master_reverb_levels, AIL_set_sample_reverb_levels
Related Basic Types: HDIGDRIVER, MILES_ROOM_TYPE, S32, void
Related FAQs: How do I set an EAX reverb room style?
